thread.section_title: Panda Ink Cartridges Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Panda Ink Cartridges Ltd | pandainkcartridges.ie
thread.title: Mark Hainbach
thread.title_full: Panda Ink Cartridges Ltd reviewed by Mark Hainbach

author: Mark Hainbach
title: Mark Hainbach
text: Excellent service from Panda Ink Cartridges. I received an e-mail advising me that the courier had lost my delivery. The order was re-sent and delivered two days later by An Post. I was kept informed at all times about the status of the order and never had to "chase it up".
